name: CometChat Docs
description: Technical documentation & Implementation guides to add In-app Messaging & Voice & Video Calling to your apps and websites in minutes.

metatags.description: Learn how to integrate, customize, and scale real-time chat using CometChat’s UI Kits, SDKs, and widgets across popular frameworks. Get step-by-step guides, best practices, and implementation details to build production-ready chat experiences.
